Question: U Power Technology (Hefei) Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
U Power Technology (Hefei) Co., Ltd

UP Super Board

- Plug-and-play EV chassis for automakers to accelerate EV development
- Integrates core capabilities of advanced electric vehicles, including electric propulsion, suspension, steering, and thermal management
- Enables automakers to design more customized upper bodies, reducing development time and costs
- UP VAN, the first all-electric van for urban logistics, built on the UP Super Board, features a large payload, cargo area volume, and a range of 171 miles on a single charge
- Strategic partnerships with Olympian Motors and LUMOS EV to deliver EVs and develop last-mile commercial van
- Empowers global carmakers to produce vehicles for local markets with short time-to-market, low upfront investment, and more choices of EVs
Summary_cn:
U Power Technology (Hefei) Co., Ltd

UP Super Board

- 为汽车制造商加速电动车发展的即插即用电动汽车底盘
- 集成了先进电动汽车的核心能力，包括电动推进、悬挂、转向和热管理
- 让汽车制造商能够设计更加定制化的上部车身，降低开发时间和成本
- UP VAN是第一款基于UP Super Board打造的全电动货车，具有大载重量、货物区容积和171英里的单次充电续航里程
- 与Olympian Motors和LUMOS EV建立战略合作伙伴关系，提供电动车辆并开发末端商用货车
- 让全球汽车制造商能够以短的上市时间、较低的前期投资和更多的电动车选择为本地市场生产汽车。
